channel.name: SABC News ZA
channel.title: G20 Focus
channel.desc: An in-depth and thought-provoking discussion that interrogates world leaders, thinkers and agitators about the undercurrents of the G20 issues.

channel.name: SABC News ZA
channel.title: Morning Live
channel.desc: Before you start your day, we've got you covered with Traffic updates to help you navigate your commute.

channel.name: SABC News ZA
channel.title: The Agenda
channel.desc: Delve into thought-provoking discussions on The Agenda, where pressing societal issues are tackled through insightful interviews and in-depth conversations.

channel.name: SABC News ZA
channel.title: On Point
channel.desc: This is a blended segment with 2 hours of general news and markets segment for an hour.

channel.name: SABC News ZA
channel.title: SA Today
channel.desc: Invited guests give more depth on big provincial and regional stories that can be an issue of national importance. It also includes general news.

channel.name: SABC News ZA
channel.title: Full View
channel.desc: The show also features 30 minutes of market sense in-depth.

channel.name: SABC News ZA
channel.title: Face The Nation
channel.desc: A hard-hitting show with the incomparable Clement Manyathela, where tough questions are tackled, and leaders will be held accountable.

channel.name: SABC News ZA
channel.title: The Late Edition
channel.desc: A 360 degree view of all the stories that made headlines through packages, features, and interviews.
